test_message: Draft announcement for mid-term exam schedule to all Sem 3 students

result.draft_message:
Dear Students,

The mid-term examination schedule for Semester 3 has been released. Please review the attached timetable carefully and make necessary preparations. For any queries, contact your department coordinator. Best of luck for your exams!

Regards,
Examination Cell
result.subject: Mid-Term Exam Schedule for Semester 3
result.preview_text: Dear Students, The mid-term examination schedule for Semester 3 has been released. Please review the attached timetable.
